value:
$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica and her forces have arrived,
and they are fighting Letizia's forces.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|This battle will be decisive. Let's give
it everything we've got!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_05,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Veronica, are you all right?
Is Letizia...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|She's alive.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|I see...$k$pSo, you...chose to let her live.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Our family, what we did to her...
It changed her. We hurt her.$k$pBut more than that, she was always
someone I looked up to... I couldn't.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Either way, it's done now.$k$p$Sbs150|$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Hah! On the contrary!$k$pThis is where it begins! Our master,
the great Lady Embla, will soon make
her grand entrance!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_11,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|E-Embla? Here?$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face|You pests are a pain to predict with
any accuracy—so erratic! But your
meddling is finally at an end...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Lady Embla descends!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what's happening? The sky was
clear a moment ago, wasn't it?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$EFace_Cool2|$Fi1500|Huh... What is...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What do you see, Sharena?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Up in the sky... Do you see that?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It's...it's just...darkness!$k$pIt's huge—like it's stretched across
the whole sky!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's coming this way! We are going
to be swallowed by it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Retreat!$k$p...No, it's already far too late for that.$k$pIt looks big enough to engulf the
entirety of Embla and Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse, if it covers Askr, then
Mother is— And the people of
Askr too! Oh no!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Our two realms are going to be
completely enclosed in darkness.$k$pHow can this...be happening?$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,0,0,0,255|
